characters: Driver of a white sedan, driver of a blue truck
summary: In this segment, the vehicle is driving on a busy road. Ahead, a blue truck is moving steadily in the center lane. A white sedan is seen on the left side in the first frame and gradually moves closer to the self-driving vehicle, eventually cutting into the lane from the left side in the last frame.
actions: The self-driving vehicle maintains a consistent speed while following the blue truck. The white sedan on the left side moves closer and eventually cuts into the lane, causing the self-driving vehicle to decelerate slightly to avoid collision.
key_objects: 1) Front: A blue truck, approximately 20 meters away, moving steadily in the center lane. 2) Left: A white sedan, approximately 5 meters away, moving closer and eventually cutting into the lane.

summary: In this segment, the vehicle is driving on an urban road approaching an intersection. A white sedan is ahead in the same lane, and a blue truck is in the adjacent left lane. The traffic light is visible in the distance.
actions: The self-driving vehicle is maintaining a steady speed while approaching the intersection. The vehicle is keeping a safe distance from the white sedan ahead and monitoring the blue truck in the adjacent lane.
key_objects: 1) Front: A white sedan, approximately 20 meters away, maintaining a steady speed. 2) Left: A blue truck, approximately 25 meters away, moving in the adjacent lane.
